column5: Lift pass: Not valid between Mezzaselva & Kublis. Guest card:  Not valid between Mezzaselva & Kublis; unless staying in Saas & guest card labelled with an S. Then not valid for travel between Saas & Kublis. Calls at Sernus Dorf between: 23.12–9.4&1.7–30.9
